00022 #pragma once

00024 #include <thrust/detail/config.h>
00025 #include <thrust/device_ptr.h>
00026 #include <thrust/device_reference.h>
00027 #include <thrust/device_malloc.h>
00028 #include <thrust/device_free.h>
00029 #include <limits>
00030 #include <stdexcept>
00031 
00032 namespace thrust
00033 {
00034 
00035 // forward declarations to WAR circular #includes
00036 template<typename> class device_ptr;
00037 template<typename T> device_ptr<T> device_malloc(const std::size_t n);
00038 
00052 template<typename T>
00053   class device_malloc_allocator
00054 {
00055   public:
00057     typedef T                                 value_type;
00058 
00060     typedef device_ptr<T>                     pointer;
00061 
00063     typedef device_ptr<const T>               const_pointer;
00064 
00066     typedef device_reference<T>               reference;
00067 
00069     typedef device_reference<const T>         const_reference;
00070 
00072     typedef std::size_t                       size_type;
00073 
00075     typedef typename pointer::difference_type difference_type;
00076 
00082     template<typename U>
00083       struct rebind
00084     {
00087       typedef device_malloc_allocator<U> other;
00088     }; // end rebind
00089 
00091     __host__ __device__
00092     inline device_malloc_allocator() {}
00093 
00095     __host__ __device__
00096     inline ~device_malloc_allocator() {}
00097 
00099     __host__ __device__
00100     inline device_malloc_allocator(device_malloc_allocator const&) {}
00101 
00103     template<typename U>
00104     __host__ __device__
00105     inline device_malloc_allocator(device_malloc_allocator<U> const&) {}
00106 
00110     __host__ __device__
00111     inline pointer address(reference r) { return &r; }
00112     
00116     __host__ __device__
00117     inline const_pointer address(const_reference r) { return &r; }
00118 
00124     __host__
00125     inline pointer allocate(size_type cnt,
00126                             const_pointer = const_pointer(static_cast<T*>(0)))
00127     {
00128       if(cnt > this->max_size())
00129       {
00130         throw std::bad_alloc();
00131       } // end if
00132 
00133       return pointer(device_malloc<T>(cnt));
00134     } // end allocate()
00135 
00142     __host__
00143     inline void deallocate(pointer p, size_type cnt)
00144     {
00145       device_free(p);
00146     } // end deallocate()
00147 
00151     inline size_type max_size() const
00152     {
00153       return (std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max)() / sizeof(T);
00154     } // end max_size()
00155 
00159     __host__ __device__
00160     inline bool operator==(device_malloc_allocator const&) { return true; }
00161 
00165     __host__ __device__
00166     inline bool operator!=(device_malloc_allocator const &a) {return !operator==(a); }
00167 }; // end device_malloc_allocator
00168 
00172 } // end thrust
